entity_description: Co-founder of Microsoft, philanthropist, and pioneer in the software industry.
Co-founder of Apple Inc., visionary in PERSONsonal computing and consumer electronics.
CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, Neuralink, and co-founder of PayPal, known for innovation in electric vehicles and space exploration.
Co-founder and CEO of Meta (Facebook), influential in social media and virtual reality.
CEO of Alphabet and Google, key figure in AI and cloud computing.
CEO of Apple Inc., leading innovation in consumer electronics and services.
CEO of Microsoft, driving cloud computing and AI advancements.
Founder and CEO of Dell Technologies, pioneer in direct sales and customized computing.
Co-founder of Google, instrumental in search engine technology and AI development.
Co-founder of Google, key contributor to search technology and innovation.
Founder of Amazon, innovator in e-commerce and cloud computing.
Former COO of Facebook, influential in social media business strategy.
Former CEO of YouTube, key figure in online video and digital advertising.
Co-founder and CEO of Netflix, pioneer in streaming media.
Co-founder of Twitter and Square, influential in social media and fintech.
Co-founder and CEO of Oracle Corporation, major figure in database technology.
CEO of Nvidia, leader in graphics processing and AI chip development.
CEO of Salesforce, pioneer in cloud-based customer relationship management.
Co-founder of Uber, revolutionary in ride-sharing and gig economy.
Co-founder and CEO of Airbnb, innovator in sharing economy and hospitality.
Co-founder and CEO of Spotify, leader in music streaming technology.
Co-founder and CEO of Snapchat, innovator in ephemeral messaging and AR.
Co-founder and CEO of Dropbox, pioneer in cloud storage solutions.
Co-founder and CEO of Stripe, leader in online payment processing.
Co-founder and President of Stripe, innovator in fintech infrastructure.
Co-founder of LinkedIn, influential in professional networking and venture capital.
Co-founder of PayPal and Palantir, prominent venture capitalist and entrepreneur.
Co-founder of Facebook and Asana, influential in social media and productivity software.
Co-founder and CTO of Snapchat, key figure in mobile messaging innovation.
Co-founder of Instagram, pioneer in photo-sharing and social media.
